TEXT.TITLE: SITHE TO RAISE ENERGY FACTORS <EFAC> STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Sithe-Energies LP said it has signed an agreement under which it will increase its interest in Energy Factors Inc to 70.0 pct from 53.4 pct now by investing 100 mln dlrs in Energy Factors stock. Reuter
